entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 23. POP 30%
